author: julianfoad
msg: Fix up the svn:mergeinfo properties. The following mergeinfo seems to have
been lost accidentally from the root of the branch in the catch-up merge
Replace missing mergeinfo in the "svn:mergeinfo" property.

author: julianfoad
msg: During the r32872 catch-up merge, I merged the file "merge_authz_tests.py"
in two steps to work around a problem whereby the automatic merge failed.
This resulted in explicit mergeinfo on the file that was unnecessary (and
perhaps wrong; I'm not sure). Since this "subtree mergeinfo" causes svn
1.5.2's "merge --reintegrate" to fail, I am removing it.

author: julianfoad
msg: Improve doc strings etc. in run_tests.py.
better reflect its usage in this program. Document this function more

author: fabien
msg: * subversion/po/fr.po: po-update, 12 fuzzy and 3 untranslated fixed.
